title: American Idol Winner Trent Harmon Drinks Michter's 20, Four Roses LE Small Batch, Talks Idol, Getting Hacked and More
itunes:title: American Idol Winner Trent Harmon Drinks Michter's 20, Four Roses LE Small Batch, Talks Idol, Getting Hacked and More
description:
What happens when you put Fred in the room with American Idol winner country music star Trent Harmon? Well, bourbon gets sipped. 

Trent's a huge bourbon fan. And Fred's a fan of Trent's remarkable songwriting / singing talent. 

The two hit it off like they were old friends, chatting about ascots, social media hackers and the drawbacks of fame. It didn't hurt Fred poured rare gems Michter's 20-year-old, Four Roses Limited Edition Small Batch and Angel's Envy Tawny Port finish, among others. 

They sipped, laughed and solved some of the world's problems.... all over good bourbon and song.

Listen to Trent's Music
